description:

Allen's shorts were fighting to stay on, barely hanging onto that golden muscle butt of his (but I am not sure that he wanted them to stay on). After some play time and a little kissing on the beach, it was time to get them both naked and ready for some balls-deep fucking.
Allen slowly pushed back against Nolan's cock, taking it all in while goose bumps covered his body. And then he cut loose and rode it like it was all he was waiting for! Allen was in control of this fuck session and neither of them was holding back...
title: Allen & Nolan
